posts.post_title: T206 Huggins Port Cycle and Hands Tolstoi SOLDDDD!
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
Nearly got my new big purchase paid for, I just need a little bit more $$.  These two are next on the list.  They have seen better days, but a couple nice HOFer combo cards.

$85 delivered and you own both, Paypal.  (SOLDD CW)

Thanks,
Bob
